content.text:
# TimedText:Democratic Republic of the Congo's national anthem.ogg.en.srt

1
00:00:02,000 --> 00:00:04,400
Arise, Congolese,
2
00:00:04,400 --> 00:00:06,600
United by fate,
3
00:00:06,600 --> 00:00:11,600
United in the struggle for independence.
4
00:00:11,600 --> 00:00:17,600
Let us hold up our heads, so long bowed,
5
0:00:17,600 --> 00:00:21,300
And now, for good, let's keep advance boldly,
6
00:00:21,300 --> 00:00:22,200
In peace.
15
00:00:22,200 --> 00:00:26,700
Oh, ardent people, by hard work we shall build,
16
00:00:26,700 --> 00:00:30,200
Our country more beautiful than before
17
00:00:30,200 --> 00:00:31,600
In peace.
18
00:00:31,600 --> 00:00:35,900
Countrymen, all we sing
19
00:00:35,900 --> 00:00:40,700
The sacred hymn of your solidarity.
20
00:00:40,700 --> 00:00:45,300
Citizens, proudly salute
21
00:00:45,300 --> 00:00:48,900
The golden emblem of your sovereignty,
22
00:00:48,900 --> 00:00:50,100
Congo!
23
00:00:50,100 --> 00:00:52,300
Blessed gift, Congo!
24
00:00:52,300 --> 00:00:54,500
Of our forefathers, Congo!
25
00:00:54,500 --> 00:00:56,900
Oh fatherland, Congo!
26
00:00:56,900 --> 00:00:59,000
Oh beloved, Congo!
27
00:00:59,000 --> 00:01:00,600
We shall populate your soil
28
00:01:00,600 --> 00:01:03,900
and ensure your eternal greatness.
29
00:01:03,900 --> 00:01:06,300
30 June, oh gentle sun
30
00:01:06,300 --> 00:01:08,500
30 June, of 30 June
31
00:01:08,500 --> 00:01:10,900
Holy day, the historical witness
32
00:01:10,900 --> 00:01:13,200
Holy day, immortal day
33
00:01:13,200 --> 00:01:16,600
Is the oath of freedom,
34
00:01:16,600 --> 00:01:17,900
That we pass on
35
00:01:17,900 --> 00:01:20,800
To our future generation,
36
00:01:20,800 --> 00:01:25,000
Forever!
